name: Tim Andres
tagline: Computer Science Student and Lead Developer on the DM Project at Drew University
body: Hi, I'm Tim Andres, a Senior Computer Science Major (and Mathematics Minor) at Drew University. I'm the lead software developer for the [DM Project](http://dm.drew.edu), a web based tool which allows scholars to annotate visual and textual representations of ancient manuscripts, maps, and more. I also chair [Drew University Student Government](http://groups.drew.edu/sg/)'s Budget and Appropriations Board.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
